msbt.message: Have you heard? There's supposed to be some kinda event happenin' soon on our island, !Well, I say it's about time somethin' interestin' happened around here!
Tomorrow's the big day Our first big island event!Wonder if it'll live up to the hype.
Looks like the Fishing Tourney starts up next Saturday.If you're gonna toss your rod in the ring, I guess I'll have to put my big-boy waders on. Can't have you catchin' all the fish! Gahaha!

I can't wait for the Fishing Tourney to start tomorrow!Got my fishin' rod ready, and I've been practicing my cast every chance I get.Not to toot my own horn, but I should warn you I'm somethin' of a fishin' expert. So, don't let my score throw you for a loop tomorrow, kiddo. Gahaha!

Finally! The Bug-Off starts next Saturday! Feels like I've been waitin' forever, . But fair warning If you're jumpin' in the fray, I'm pulling out my lucky bug-huntin' net. It never fails me! Can't let a whippersnapper like you catch all the critters! Gahaha!

The Bug-Off starts tomorrow! You ready, ?I fixed the hole in my bug net and I'm gonna put in some time practicing my swing tonight. The Bug-Off is serious business, kiddo. You gotta get your head in the game before it even begins!

The fireworks show is tomorrow! Wow, I can't wait!Those lights dancin' in the sky They're like a big ol' salute to the year so far, .I swear, watching fireworks makes me feel like a kid again! Tomorrow's gonna be grand!
Just realized we'll hear from the Happy Home Academy tomorrow!Why do I feel like they're not gonna like what I've done with my place?
So, , did you hear from the Happy Home Academy yet? They weren't impressed by me.
Another year almost behind us. Makes me a little gloomy, the way they slip away so fast from me Can't stop time, but at least I can party during the big Countdown!
Tomorrow, is already over Seems like it went by in a flash.Let's welcome the new year by goin' wild at the Countdown tomorrow!

Time sure does fly. Can't believe it's nearly May already. At least we got May Day on the first to get us goin'.By the by, hear about this May Day thing they're plannin'? Guess it's gonna be on some other island.Don't know about you, but a little travel sounds kinda perfect right about now, .
Did you hear we gotta have a special May Day Ticket to go to the May Day thing tomorrow, ?Tom Nook'll learn you all about it tomorrow, so don't panic or nothin', kiddo.
